definitions.definition: Extremely costly ; so expensive as to cause financial ruin.
examples: They were forced to completely replace the roof at ruinous expense.

definitions.definition: Characterized by ruin; ruined ; dilapidated ; as, an edifice, bridge, or wall in a ruinous state.

secondary_definitions: Extremely costly ; so expensive as to cause financial ruin.
Characterized by ruin; ruined ; dilapidated ; as, an edifice, bridge, or wall in a ruinous state.
